select t1.id,t1.sn,t1.pay_money,t1.remark,t1.refunded,t1.state,t1.pay_time,t1.add_time, t2.name studentName, t3.mobile mobile from shop_order t1 left join student t2 on t2.id = t1.student_id left join `user` t3 on t3.id = t1.user_id
AND t1.student_id = #{param.studentId}
AND t1.id = (select order_id from shop_order_item where item_id = #{param.courseId} and item_type=1 )
AND t1.state in
#{id}
AND t1.sn like concat( #{param.sn}, '%')
AND ( t1.add_time >= #{param.startDate} and t1.add_time <= #{param.endDate} )
and t1.deleted = 0
order by t1.id desc
